body: Hey, hithummah, instead of being an autist commenting your disapproval on every non-vanilla SnS doujin instead of, like, ignoring them, how about you get off your lazy ass and learn how to draw then you can make all the ErinaxSouma vanilla you want instead of complaining about artists not pandering to you and your taste, hm?
"Omg, am I psychic/hypnotic(??!?!?!?!)?" is probably the worst trope I can even think of, this is so bad.
Dumb hentai artists, don't give us half ass random faceless dude. Make it Erina x Soma or even better, Erina x Jouchirou
ony beta faggts like to slurp on feet.
